comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Tammo Count Hans Axel von Schwerin-Löwitz (19 May 1847, Löwitz – 4 November 1918) was a German politician and officer. Source: Wikipedia

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Where does Tammo fit in his name? It seems to be inconsistently treated in the various wikipedia entries, including de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hans_Graf_von_Schwerin-L%C3%B6witz He was president of the lower house of the Prussian diet or parliament, the Abgeordnetenhaus, or House of Representatives, from 1913-1918, when it was abolished. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prussian_House_of_Representatives The president of the upper house is in the next picture:

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The English wikipedia entry is obviously mistaken, Hans Axel Tammo Graf von Schwerin-Löwitz (short: Hans Graf von Schwerin) is the correct name, see e.g. www.deutsche-biographie.de/xsfz120439.html de.academic.ru/dic.nsf/dewiki/577408 home.foni.net/~adelsforschung/reichss.htm biblioteca.universia.net/html_bura/ficha/params/title/auf...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Thanks.  I made that change and a few others in the English Wikipedia entry, but it still needs a lot of work.  Some of it reads like a translation of a translation.
